constexpr const ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;&amp; base() const &amp;;

Returns the underlying cached iterator to current element (in current chunk) in {{tt|chunk_view}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to the enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}.

Equivalent to: {{box|{{c/core|return *}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}}{{c/core|-&gt;}}{{lti|cpp/ranges/chunk_view#Data members|current_;}}}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
An iterator.
